name: Udon sospetti
desc: Highly springy noodles. The overly bland noodles and soup make for a boring experience. Looks like you've got to pay a bit more attention to seasoning next time.

customize.name: Ricetta: udon
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Udon Noodles.

customize.name: Farina
customize.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

customize.name: Alga
customize.desc: A plant that grows in shallow seas. It adds a unique flavor to dishes.

customize.name: Pesce
customize.desc: Un filetto di pesce fresco. Se trattato in modo appropriato, pu√≤ diventare un piatto prelibato.

customize.name: Udon
customize.desc: Highly springy noodles. After several rounds of rising and pulling, the result is silky smooth yet springy noodles. Unlike ramen, which prizes dense flavors, udon noodles use light flavors to heal the Inazuman soul.

customize.name: Udon deliziosi
customize.desc: Highly springy noodles. The snow-white, soft yet elastic udon, and the elegantly flavored soup combine to make a simple but comforting dish. The faintest scent of wheat may eventually travel down into your belly together with the sweet noodles, but the aftertaste of warmth will remain.

value.text: Revives a character and restores 250 HP.
